pages.text: All spells, however, require a special, easy-to-access pouch to be cast from. The Component Pouch is the most basic form of this, with a slots to carry your herbs and to carry your items.

pages.title: Component Pouch
pages.text: The larger, left side of the pouch can contain any items of your choosing, while the smaller right compartment is used to carry your herbs, always ready for casting.
